    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Battery
    Represents a battery component in the circuit simulator.
    BlobDbOpps
     
    CircuitUtils
    Utility class providing helper methods for analyzing circuit connectivity.
    Component
    Abstract base class for all circuit components in the simulator.
    DbOpps
     
    Lightbulb
    Represents a Lightbulb component in the circuit simulator.
    LoadingScreenController
    Controller class for the loading screen.
    Login
     
    LoginController
    Controller for the login and registration view in the Circuit Project application.
    MainMenuController
    Controller for the main menu after user login.
    Port
    Represents a connection point on a Component or Wire in the circuit.
    ProfileController
    Controller class for managing the user profile view in the circuit simulator application.
    Project
    Represents a circuit project containing metadata such as name, description, timestamps, user association, and a reference to blob storage for circuit data.
    ProjectBlobManager
     
    ProjectManager
    Singleton class to manage the currently active Project in the circuit editor.
    Regex
    Utility class for validating user input using regular expressions.
    SandboxController
    Controller class for the circuit simulator sandbox interface.
    Switch
    Represents a switch component in a circuit that can toggle between open and closed states.
    TutorialController
    Controller for the tutorial screen in the circuit simulator application.
    User
    Represents a user in the circuit simulator application.
    UserManager
    Singleton class that manages the current logged-in User.
    Wire
    Represents a wire component that connects two ports in a circuit.
